text: Santos Juliá Díaz (1940–23 October 2019) was a Spanish historian and sociologist. He was born in Ferrol, Spain. He studied at the Complutense University of Madrid. He was professor emeritus of Social History and Political Thought at the Universidad Nacional de Educación a Distancia (UNED). Díaz died on 23 October 2019 in Madrid at the age of 79. ==Works== * * * * * * ==Notes== ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish historians Category:Spanish sociologists
title: Santos Juliá
